attributes.review: First off i open the app and an add for planned parenthood popes up??!!! 🤬I thought we were all for abolishing abortion’s!!! Secondly every time you open the app it immediately drains 12% from your phone 🙄🙄🙄 i expect better from this??? 😡😡😡😞😞☹️

attributes.review: First of all when I opened up up the up I saw a crusty old Cheeto looking at me. And I almost had a freaking hard attack looking at that sweaty pig. I would not recommended downloading this app unless you on being traumatized.
